plugins\/weather\/desktop\/php\/weather..Aucun équipement Météo trouvé, cliquer s: No Weather equipment found, click "Add" to start
plugins\/weather\/desktop\/php\/weather..Cocher la case pour afficher toutes les: Check the box to display all weather information on mobile devices
plugins\/weather\/desktop\/php\/weather..Cocher la case pour afficher des images: Check the box to display images instead of icons on the widget
plugins\/weather\/desktop\/php\/weather..Indiquer la latitude du lieu dont il fau: Indicate the latitude of the place from which the weather information must be retrieved
plugins\/weather\/desktop\/php\/weather..Indiquer la longitude du lieu dont il fa: Indicate the longitude of the place from which the weather information must be retrieved

plugins\/weather\/core\/class\/weather.c.La latitude et la longitude ne peut être: Latitude and longitude cannot be empty

info.json.Ce plugin permet de récuperer les inform: This plugin allows you to retrieve weather information from the location of your choice such as current conditions and temperatures and those of the coming days, humidity, wind strength and direction, sunrise and sunset times and much more... You wanted to buy a weather station? This plugin will surely change your mind!
